newsArray.title: Cerys Vaughan Wins Appeal After Football Ban Over Trans Comment
creator: Jude Obafemi, THEWILL
newsArray.description: May 10, (THEWILL) – Cerys Vaughan, an 18-year-old footballer from Greater Manchester, has won her appeal against a six-game ban imposed by the England Football Association for asking a transgender opponent: “Are you a man?” during a friendly match in 2024. The incident occurred when Vaughan, then 17, played for Leigh Genesis in the Greater [...]The post Cerys Vaughan Wins Appeal After Football Ban Over Trans Comment appeared first on THEWILL NEWS MEDIA.

newsArray.title: L'OM sans Ismaël Bennacer ni Geoffrey Kondogbia pour affronter Le Havre
creator: Marco Cunill
newsArray.description: L'OM se déplace ce samedi (21 heure) sur la pelouse du stade Océane pour y affronter Le Havre dans un match crucial pour la course à la qualification en Ligue des champions. Roberto De Zerbi sera privé d'Ismaël Bennacer et de Geoffrey Kondogbia.
